questions.question_text: Which statements describe benefits of Snowflake's separation of compute and storage? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Storage volume growth and compute usage growth can be tightly coupled.
choices.B: The separation ensures consistent data encryption across all virtual data warehouses.
choices.E: Compute can be scaled up or down without the requirement to add more storage.
choices.C: The separation supports automatic conversion of semi-structured data into structured data for advanced data analysis.
choices.A: The separation allows independent scaling of computing resources.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The MIN_DATA_RETENTION_TIME_IN_DAYS account parameter can be set by users with the ACCOUNTADMIN role to set a minimum retention period for the account.

questions.question_text: Which parameter can be set at the account level to set the minimum number of days for which Snowflake retains historical data in Time Travel?
